#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<iomanip>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,ht1,mt1,st1,ht2,mt2,st2,s1,s2,s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    cin>>ht1>>mt1>>st1;
    cin>>ht2>>mt2>>st2;
    s1= (ht1*60*60)+(mt1*60)+st1;
    s2= (ht2*60*60)+(mt2*60)+st2;
    s=s2-s1;
    s=s%400;
    if(s<100 || (s>=200 && s<300))
    cout<<"S"<<endl;
    else
    cout<<"C"<<endl;
    }
//    fflush(stdin);
//    system("PAUSE");
    return 0;
}
